name: User Story Template
about: Template used for creating User stories
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

**As a** [role], 
**I need** [feature],
 **so that** [benefit].

### Acceptance Criteria

 ```gherkin
 Given [some context]
 When [certain action is taken]
 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
 ```
